article.headline: Houston Baptist 70, N.J. Tech 51
article.story: HOUSTON -- Gordon Watt scored 20 points and had eight rebounds to help lead Houston Baptist to a 70-51 victory over the New Jersey Institute of Technology on Saturday night. Emmanuel Willis turned in a double-double performance for the Huskies (4-23) with 15 points and 10 rebounds while Andrew Puzyk scored 17 and Mario Flaherty came in off the bench to add 11 points. Jheryl Wilson led the Highlanders (1-26) with 23 points to go along with eight rebounds. Houston Baptist outscored the Highlanders 44-29 in the second half and led in points off turnovers 25-11.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
